param.name: pdwLock
param.para: A pointer to a variable of type DWORD that specifies the address that receives the lock during the call to the method.

returns.para: Returns S_FALSE if the store is not open or if the store cannot be saved. Returns the result of otherwise.

remarks.para: Note is supported through Windows XP. It is not supported in later operating systems.

summary.para: Writes the contents specified by pdwLoc to storage.

param.name: pdwLock
param.para: A pointer to a variable of type DWORD that specifies the address that receives the lock.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful, or an error value, including the following:

description.para: Saving was unsuccessful. The storage is not open or is open without write access.

remarks.para: Note is supported through Windows XP. It is not supported in later operating systems.

summary.para: Checks to see if the image is in the store.

param.name: pszName
param.para: A pointer to a null-terminated string that specifies the path to the file that contains the image.

param.name: pftTimeStamp
param.para: A pointer to a structure that specifies the time stamp for the image.

returns.para: Returns one of the following values.

description.para: The entry is in the store.
The entry is not in the store.

remarks.para: Note is supported through Windows XP. It is not supported in later operating systems.

summary.para: Deprecated. Exposes methods that manipulate the image cache.

remarks.para: Note IShellImageStore is supported through Windows XP. It is not supported in later operating systems.
